category.name: Administration.Access Manager
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_WSO_check_read_priv_for_project_list
preference.preference_description: Activates the evaluation of the "Read" privilege for the logged-in user for each project in the "project_list" property of a Workspace Object when accessing this property. If set to true, the projects for which the logged-in user does not have "Read" privilege are filtered out. If set to false (default value), all the projects to which a Workspace Object is assigned are returned.
